title: In the Smelting Furnace
description: “Prime that is, Prime that was, Prime that ever shall be. You are my guide, and I am your eyes and your ears. Give me your lessons as you see fit, but forgive me my shortcomings. I am as you made me and can do no more. Push me not into hardship and peril, but treat me with justice.”A belief in a common deity and conflicts of honor are all that bind the disparate clans together. Until the day Shughart, a young man who lives as an outcast among the McGowen Clan is approached by a strange man prophesying the need for a leader to unite all the Clans against the greatest threat their world of Forma has ever faced.Is Shughart this leader? Can his broad shoulders bear the weight of a world he wants nothing to do with? And are all willing to accept this outsider as their Chief?
author: Ryan Hodros
